| HistoryText             = The Hateful Hexad was a group of small-time villains who decided to band together in order to rise to prominence. They confronted [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] and [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] in [[Wall Street]] three days after their formation.

Not only were the members of the team easily dealt with, but a new vilainess named [[Itsy Bitsy (Earth-616)|Itsy Bitsy]] interfered in the fight and nearly killed most of them as a display of power for Spider-Man and Deadpool.{{r|Spider-Man/Deadpool Vol 1 9}}
